sections.text: Rice’s Professional Master’s in Data Science prepares professionals with skills in data analysis, machine learning, and big data systems.
Students complete coursework in core data science topics, culminating in a capstone or practicum.

items: Bachelor’s degree in quantitative field recommended
sections.text: Applicants typically have a quantitative background and must submit transcripts, essays, and recommendations; GRE not required.
Graduates advance into data science, analytics, and technology roles across industries.
